question: Which country is hosting the Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting (CHOGM 2018)?
explanation: The Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting (CHOGM 2018) has started in London, United Kingdom with theme \'Towards a Common Future\' from April 16. Prime Minister Narendra Modi will take part in the event on 19th and 20th of April. The biennial event has brought together delegates from 53 Commonwealth nations. The focus will be on ensuring that the Commonwealth is responsive to global challenges and delivers a more prosperous, secure, sustainable and fair future for all its citizens, particularly its young people.
